word_group.brief_definition: 提及, 谈起；涉及, 相关

bilingual.source: Historians often refer to Cato when discussing Roman history.
bilingual.target: 历史学家在讨论罗马历史时经常提到卡托。

bilingual.source: Please refer to the aforementioned document for more details.
bilingual.target: 请参阅前面提到的文件以获取更多详细信息。

bilingual.source: Engineers often refer to phot when discussing light measurements.
bilingual.target: 工程师在讨论光测量时经常提到光度单位。

bilingual.source: Chemists often refer to amu when discussing molecular weights.
bilingual.target: 化学家在讨论分子量时经常提到原子质量单位。

bilingual.source: The ancient texts often refer to the godhead in their descriptions.
bilingual.target: 古代文本中经常提到神性。

bilingual.source: The ancient texts often refer to Elohim as the creator of the universe.
bilingual.target: 古代文本常常提到上帝是宇宙的创造者。

bilingual.source: Some people refer to Lucifer when discussing the concept of rebellion.
bilingual.target: 有些人在讨论反叛的概念时会提到路西法。

bilingual.source: Scientists often refer to Bohr when discussing the history of quantum physics.
bilingual.target: 科学家们在讨论量子物理的历史时经常提到波尔。

bilingual.source: Pronouns are often used to refer to a noun that has already been mentioned.
bilingual.target: 代词经常用来指已经提到过的名词。

list.abstract: refer（英 [rɪˈfɜː]，美 [rɪˈfɜːr]），英语单词，作动词为提到；谈到；指。短语搭配有refer to（提及, 谈起；涉及, 相关）、refer to as ...（称为）。例句为“Some people refer to such modification as maturity（有些人把这种修改称为成熟）”。 refer相关近义词有deal with、to consult等。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to refer that to my attorney.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要把这个问题交给我的律师回答。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you at least refer me to a rogue ex-cop? What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你起码能给我推荐一位被开除的警察吧？什么？

yingyinNormal.en: All righty. What's new? Well, just recently, I learned that you refer to us as Shamy, and I don't like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，有什么新鲜事吗？我刚才得知你称呼我们为"谢米"，而我并不喜欢。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, everything went fine. I didn't even have to refer to my impromptu conversation starters. That woman across the hall is into me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说，一切都挺好的，连事先准备的一些开场白都没用到呢，走廊对面那个女孩，就是喜欢我嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: When I refer to your ego barrier, I'm talking about the parts of your brain that prevent you from acknowledging your weaknesses objectively, so that you can figure out how to deal with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到自负障碍，我指的是你大脑的某些部分阻止你客观地承认自己的弱点，让你无法想出解决办法。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提及; 涉及; 描述

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 提及；谈到；引证；资料引用；证明信；介绍信；提交；引文；递交；引文出处

word_family.mean: v. 提到；谈到；指；提交…做出决定；进行处理；把…归因于；淘汰；参考；查阅；让…注意

sense_info_list.en: talk or write about someone or something, especially in only a few words
sense_info_list.zh: 提及; 涉及; 描述

examination_example.sentence: GDP already predicted to slow as a result, it is now a timely moment to assess what he was <highlight>referring</highlight> to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国内生产总值已经预计将因此放缓，现在是时候评估他所提及的是什么了。

examination_example.sentence: What Kennedy was <highlight>referring</highlight> to was that GDP has been the most common method for measuring the economic activity of nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 肯尼迪提及到的是，国内生产总值一直是衡量国家经济活动的最常用方法。

examination_example.sentence: The blurring of working women's roles <highlight>refers</highlight> to the fact that they are both bread winners and housewives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业女性角色的模糊是指她们既是养家糊口的人，也是家庭主妇。

sense_info_list.en: use a particular word, expression, or name to mention or describe someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Rats have been shown to engage in multiple forms of reciprocal help and cooperation, including what is <highlight>referred</highlight> to as direct reciprocity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老鼠被证明参与了多种形式的互惠帮助和合作，包括所谓的直接互惠。

examination_example.sentence: Many French politicians and media outlets have <highlight>referred</highlight> to this as a "GAFA tax".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多法国政客和媒体称这是一种“GAFA税”。

examination_example.sentence: As the brain fades, we <highlight>refer</highlight> to these occurrences as "senior moments."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着大脑的衰退，我们称这些事件为“老年失忆症”。

sense_info_list.en: read or otherwise use a source of information in order to ascertain something

examination_example.sentence: Verify news by <highlight>referring</highlight> to diverse sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过参考不同的来源来核实新闻。

sense_info_list.en: trace or attribute something to someone or something as a cause or source

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: talk or write about someone or something, especially in only a few words

examination_example.sentence: I'm not <highlight>referring</highlight> to employees who are legitimately dissatisfied with their employment conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我指的不是那些对自己工作条件感到不满的员工。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Referring</highlight> to a line from Jurassic Park,"People are too busy thinking about what they can do to think about whether they should do it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提到《侏罗纪公园》中的一句台词，“人们都忙着想自己能做什么，而没有去想自己是否应该去做。”

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>refers</highlight> to the idea that when objects trying to resemble humans aren't quite perfect, they can make viewers feel uneasy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是指当试图模仿人类的物体并不完美时，它们会让观众感到不安。

sense_info_list.en: use a particular word, expression, or name to mention or describe someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Some like to <highlight>refer</highlight> to him as a genius, but if there was any genius to Marconi it was this vision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人喜欢把他称为天才，但如果说Marconi真有什么天赋的话，那就是这个愿景。

sense_info_list.en: read or otherwise use a source of information in order to ascertain something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

use a particular word; expression; or name to mention or describe someone or something

examination_example.sentence: In nonverbal communication terminology (术语) , physical contact and the study of touching are generally <highlight>referred</highlight> to as haptics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在非语言交流术语中(术语)，身体接触和对触摸的研究统称为触觉学。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers said they investigated individuals' attitudes towards mathematics because of what could be <highlight>referred</highlight> to as a mathematics crisis in the UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，因为英国出现了一场数学危机，所以他们调查了个人对数学的态度，。

examination_example.sentence: The phenomenon is often <highlight>referred</highlight> to as the Matthew effect, inspired by the Bible's wisdom that to those who have, more will be given.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种现象通常被称为马太效应，灵感来自圣经的智慧，即拥有的人会得到更多。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, it <highlight>refers</highlight> to anything that is acquired or learnt, rather than instinctive or natural.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，该词是指任何后天习得、学到的，而不是本能或天生的东西。

examination_example.sentence: The carts he <highlight>refers</highlight> to are small shopping carts — the symbol of a true Venetian.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他所说的手推车是小型购物车，是真正的威尼斯人的象征。

sense_info_list.en: trace or attribute something to someone or something as a cause or source

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
